description.value:
Satyr*

Fleet of Foot. Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

Fey. You are considered Fey rather than Humanoid. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.9X0K8Q48LRGE4H8A]{Fey}

Mirthful Leaps. Whenever you make a long or high jump, you can roll a d8 and add the number to the number of feet you cover, even when making a standing jump. This extra distance costs movement as normal. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.CDQJ8V0HZBDFJUHQ]{Mirthful Leaps}

Fey Ancestry. You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put you to sleep. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.0194RUSX6VOGVO1Z]{Fey Ancestry}

Ram. You can use your head and horns to make unarmed strikes. It uses your Strength or Constitution and deals 1d6 + your modifier bludgeoning damage on a hit. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.TPNCC1ZXN1E01YW3]{Ram}
